name: Star Bounce
description:
Dash and Jump your way through the world of Star Jump as the world keeps getting smaller and harder.

(Game Shows everything but here they are for convenience) Controls:

  • A and D or Arrow Keys to move
  • Space or Shift to dash

How does this game fit the Less is More Theme: Well this game fits the theme because as the blocks in the level become less more gameplay and routes can become open to the player!!
